= LINUX CHEAT SHEETS =

* Terminal
  * Fun Commands
    - No more secrets
      $ nms *phrase*
    - cmatrix
      Matrix like
      $ cmatrix
    - cava
      Music visualizer
      $ cava
    - cal
      Calander
      $ cal
    - asciiquarium
      $ asciiquarium
      An aquarium for your terminal!
    - Figlet
      Turn text into ascii art banners
      figlet *phrase*
    - Banner
      Like figlet. Turns text into ascii art
      $ banner *phrase*
    - Boxes
      Like figlet but with boxes
      $ boxes *phrase*
    - sl
      Trains! WOO WOOOO!!
      $ sl
    - oneko
      Adds an animated cat that follow your mouse cursor
      $oneko
    - nyancat
      POP TART CAT!
      $ nyancat
    - pom
      Pomodoro timer that aids productivety (somehow...)
      $ pom
    - bb
      Presents a variety of animations
      $ bb
      - options
        | Command      | Option                            |
        | -help        | list commands                     |
        | -driver      | linux, slang, X11, stdout, stderr |
        | -kbddriver   | slang, X11, stdin                 |
        | -mousedriver | X11, gpm, dos                     |
        | -width       | Set width                         |
        | -height      | Set height                        |
        | -minwidth    |                                   |
        | -maxwidth    |                                   |
        | -minheight   |                                   |
        | -maxheight   |                                   |
        | -dim         | Enable half bright                |
| -bold        | Enable bold                       |
| -normal      | Enable normal                     |
| -boldfont    | Enable bold font                  |
        | -inverse     | Enable inverse rendering          |
        | -loop        | loop forever                      |
